summary: Aliens known as the Xiliens arrive on Earth seeking to borrow Godzilla and Rodan to save their planet from Monster Zero. Sent on the expedition are astronauts Glenn and Fuji who discover it's none other than King Ghidorah.
cast: Nick Adams|Akira Takarada|Jun Tazaki|Akira Kubo|Kumi Mizuno|Keiko Sawai|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Takamaru Sasaki|Gen Shimizu|Kenzô Tabu|Yoshifumi Tajima|Nadao Kirino|Kôji Uno|Tôru Ibuki|Kazuo Suzuki|Fuyuki Murakami|Noriko Sengoku|Someshô Matsumoto|Kamayuki Tsubono|Toki Shiozawa|Yasuhisa Tsutsumi|Rinsaku Ogata|Masaaki Tachibana|Yutaka Oka|Saburô Iketani|Yoshizo Tatake|Mitsuo Tsuda|Hideki Furukawa|Ryôji Shimizu|Minoru Itô|Takuzô Kumagai|Tadashi Okabe|Haruo Nakajima|Masaki Shinohara|Shôichi Hirose|Marvin Miller|Gorô Naya|Peter Fernandez|Bin Furuya|Shigeo Katô|Akio Kusama|Akira Wakamatsu
title: Los monstruos invaden la Tierra
